MESSAGES.GLOBAL__CONFIRM_DELETE: Are you sure you want to delete this?
MESSAGES.HELP__PAGE_EXPLAIN_CONTENT:
Hier kannst du deine Fragen und Antworten schnell auflisten lassen.

Die Liste der Fragen werden automatisch von mineweb.org bezogen und in Echtzeit aufgezeigt.
MESSAGES.HELP__POST_TICKET_EXPLAIN: Stelle deine Frage direkt hier und es wird direkt in unser Ticketsystem übergeben. Support- und Hilfeseite .
MESSAGES.HELP__POST_TICKET_CONTENT: Beschreibe so genau wie möglich dein Problem!
MESSAGES.NOTIFICATION__DISPLAY_FROM: Siehe Benachrichtungen, welche von dir kommen
MESSAGES.NOTIFICATION__DELETE_ALL_FROM_ALL_USERS: Delete all notifications from all users
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_CANT_BE_DOWNLOADED: Das Plugin kann nicht heruntergeladen werden
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_REQUIREMENTS: Die Anforderungen des Plugins wurden nicht erfüllt. Das Plugin kann nicht heruntergeladen werden.
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_NOT_VALID: Da das Plugin nicht valide ist, kann es nicht installiert werden.
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_SQL_INSTALLATION: Es ist ein Fehler beim bearbeiten der SQL Datenbank aufgetreten
MESSAGES.ERROR__PLUGIN_PERMISSIONS: Das Plugin konnte nicht installiert oder aktualisiert werden, da aktuell kein Zugriff auf die Ordner /app/ Plugin/ (775 or 755) gewährt wurde.
MESSAGES.ERROR__CSRF: Ein CSRF ist aufgetreten. Bitte aktualisiere die Seite oder versuche es später erneut.
MESSAGES.ERROR__DATABASE_CONTENT: Stelle sicher, dass die Datenbankverbindung richtig konfiguriert ist. Um ganz sicher zu sein, navigiere im FTP zu der Datei /app/Config/database.php und schreibe die Verbindungsdaten direkt in die Datei. Danach kannst du diese Seite erneut Laden. Wenn auch das nicht geholfen hat, kontaktiere den Support.
MESSAGES.ERROR__INTERNAL_ERROR: Interner Fehler. Bitte versuche es erneut!
MESSAGES.ERROR__404_CONTENT: Die {URL} Seite konnte nicht gefunden werden!
MESSAGES.ERROR__403_CONTENT: Du hast keine Erlaubnis, die Seite {URL} aufzurufen!
MESSAGES.GALLERY__PARAGRAPH: Die Bilder in der nachfolgenden Liste wurden schon hochgeladen. Du kannst sie ganz einfach neu nutzen.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CONDITION: Put the link of the general conditions of use to activate this option. ! Please note, not all themes are compatible and may prevent registration.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_EMAIL: Email to send emails to users
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_MONEY_NAME_PLURAL: Name of your currency in the plural
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_LANG: Choose the language of the CMS
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_EMAIL_SEND_TYPE: How would you like to send your emails?
MESSAGES.CONFIG__INFO_LANG: The footer (COPYRIGHT) must contain a link to mineweb.org or the configuration has not been saved (<a href="http://mineweb.org">mineweb.org</a>)
MESSAGES.CONFIG__ERROR_SAVE_LANG: The footer (COPYRIGHT) does not contain a link to mineweb.org, so the configuration has not been saved.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_END_LAYOUT_COE: Code to add on each page (example: tawk.to scripts ...)
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_CONFIRM_MAIL_SIGNUP: Confirmation of the email at registration
MESSAGES.CONFIG__CONFIRM_MAIL_SIGNUP_EXPLAIN: At the registration, an email will be sent to the user, this one will have to confirm it by clicking on the link received in the mail.You can choose if the account is blocked or not if the email 'is not confirmed'
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_MEMBER_PAGE_TYPE_EXPLAIN: You can choose to view and load all of your members on the members page (heavy if a lot of subscribers) or to display a form to perform a quick search by nickname.
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_PASSWORDS_SALT: Do you want to use a salt?
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_PASSWORDS_ADVERTISSEMENT: Warning! By modifying these settings, the current passwords of your site will no longer be good and will force your users to use the 'password forgotten' function
MESSAGES.CONFIG__KEY_SESSION_TYPE_INFO: This is an advanced tuning of your site, you do not need to change it if you do not use it, by default the CMS uses php sessions.
MESSAGES.EMAIL__CONTENT_CONFIRM_MAIL:
Hi {USERNAME}!
You registered on {DATE} with IP {IP} , you have to confirm your email by going to this link {LINK}.


This email is automatic, no need to answer.
MESSAGES.THEME__CANT_DELETE_IF_ACTIVE: A theme can not be deleted when activated!
MESSAGES.THEME__CUSTOM_FILES_FILE_CONTENT_CHOOSE: Choose a file to see its contents
MESSAGES.THEME__UPDATE_SUCCESS: The theme has been updated successfully!
MESSAGES.THEME__SUPPORTED_EXPLAIN:
Some features

may not be available with this theme.
MESSAGES.THEME__ERROR_INSTALL_DOWNLOAD_FAILED: The theme could not be downloaded from mineweb.org servers.
MESSAGES.THEME__ERROR_INSTALL_UNZIP: The theme could not be installed, check that the app / View / Themed folder is available for writing.
MESSAGES.INSTALL__STEP_1_DESC: You can now configure your Administrator account
MESSAGES.INSTALL__STEP_2_DESC: You have completed the installation of the CMS successfully! CMS configuration can be in the admin panel. Click the button below to switch to use.
MESSAGES.INSTALL__ALREADY_INSTALLED: Your site is already installed, if you want to reinstall it you must delete the file /config/install.txt and /config/installed.txt .
MESSAGES.INSTALL__NO_SKIP: You can not skip this step!
MESSAGES.INSTALL__TMP_NOT_WRITABLE: The folder where MineWeb is located is not available for writing, please put the CHMOD to 777 on your folder containing MineWeb
MESSAGES.INSTALL__API_CONNECT_SUCCESS: The CMS has successfully connected to the API!
MESSAGES.NAVBAR__ICON__DESC: Name of a fa-icon : https://fontawesome.com/v4.7.0/icons/ . Ex = angle-up
MESSAGES.FORM__CHOOSE_FROM_UPLOADED_FILES: Choose from my already saved files
MESSAGES.FORM__INVALID_IMG: The file is not an image
MESSAGES.FORM__INVALID_EXTENSION: The extension is not one of those allowed ({LIST_EXTENSIONS})
MESSAGES.FORM__INVALID_WIDTH: The width is too big (MAX: {MAX_WIDTH} px)
MESSAGES.FORM__INVALID_HEIGHT: The height is too big (MAX: {MAX_HEIGHT} px)
MESSAGES.FORM__NOT_UPLOADED: The file could not be saved to the server, which may be too heavy.
MESSAGES.FORM__ERROR_WHEN_UPLOAD: An error occurred while saving the image
MESSAGES.LOGIN__BLOCKED: You have been blocked! You tried to login without success 10 times, please wait to try again.
MESSAGES.USER__MSG_NOT_CONFIRMED_EMAIL: Your email is not confirmed! You have received an email with a confirmation link. Resend the email
MESSAGES.USER__PASSWORD_CONFIRM_LABEL: Enter a second time your password
MESSAGES.USER__ERROR_EMAIL_NOT_SAME: The emails are not the same
MESSAGES.USER__ERROR_MUST_BE_LOGGED: You must be logged in to perform this action
MESSAGES.USER__RANK_ADD_SUCCESS: The rank has been added successfully!
MESSAGES.USER__EDIT_ERROR_UNKNOWN: The user could not be found.
MESSAGES.USER__EDIT_ERROR_YOURSELF: You can not edit your rank yourself.
MESSAGES.USER__BANNED_MSG: You are banned, so you have no access to this site, please contact the administrator for more information.
MESSAGES.USER__PASSWORD_RESET_EMAIL_CONTENT:
Hi {PSEUDO} !

You asked for the reset of your password ! You will find below the link to reset your password (The link will expire in 1h).
{LINK}

This is an automatic message.
MESSAGES.USER__PASSWORD_RESET_INVALID_KEY: The password reset key is invalid
MESSAGES.USER__CONFIRM_EMAIL_RESEND_SUCCESS: The confirmation email has been sent back to you!
MESSAGES.USER__CONFIRM_EMAIL_RESEND_FAIL: Confirmation email could not be sent! Retry later.
MESSAGES.USER__CONFIRM_NOTIFICATION: You have confirmed your email address!
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_NAV: Manage the navigation bar (delete, add, edit)
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__SUCCESS_SAVE: The permissions have been saved successfully!
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__BYPASS_MAINTENANCE: To be able to see the site despite maintenance
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_CONFIGURATION: Manage the general preferences of the site
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__USE_ADMIN_HELP: To be able to use the part 'help' of the admin panel
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_SERVERS: Manage the servers (link, see the players in lines ...) on the panel admin
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__VIEW_STATISTICS: See the statistics on the admin panel
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__MANAGE_THEMES: Manage themes of the site (activation, deactivation, deletion, installation, customization)
MESSAGES.PERMISSIONS__SEND_SERVER_COMMAND_FROM_DA: Send commands to the servers from the admin dashboard
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_DEFAULT_INFOS: You need to install the MineWebBridge plugin on your server to use this type of link.All information related to this manipulation is available on documentation
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_QUERY_INFOS: You do not need to install the MineWebBridge plugin on your server to use this type of link, this type of link only allows you to display the number of connected on your infrastructure. this manipulation are available on documentation
MESSAGES.SERVER__TYPE_RCON_INFOS:
The RCON protocol is available on all minecraft servers and allows to communicate with the site.To use this protocol you have to configure it in your server.properties:
  • Pass enable- rcon to true
  • Change rcon.password with a password
  • Change rcon. port with an available port
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_SUCCESS: The connection to the server has been established!
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_ERROR_ALREADY_LINKED: The server is already linked, do / mineweb reset to redo the link.
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_ERROR_INVALID_PARAMS: The connection to the server failed.
MESSAGES.SERVER__LINK_ERROR_FAILED: The connection to the server failed.
MESSAGES.SERVER__TIMEOUT_UNDEFINED: A timeout must be configured to bind a server
MESSAGES.SERVER__AFFICH_BANNER: Show this server on the site banner
MESSAGES.SERVER__CONFIG_BANNER_MSG: Configure the message displayed on the banner
MESSAGES.SERVER__MUST_BE_ON: The server must be turned on to perform this action.
MESSAGES.SERVER__SUCCESS_SWITCH: You have changed the state of the server feature.
MESSAGES.SERVER__SUCCESS_CACHE_SWITCH: You have changed the state of the cache feature.
MESSAGES.UPDATE__CHECK_STATUS: Check if an update is available
MESSAGES.UPDATE__LAST_VERSION: Latest version of the available CMS
MESSAGES.UPDATE__AUTHORIZE_FORCED_UPDATE_EXPLAIN: Enables automatic updates if a security breach has been found or a significant problem needs to be fixed.
MESSAGES.UPDATE__MAJOR_WARNING: The available update is an important update, check before you do it, which could prevent some plugin / theme features from working properly.
MESSAGES.UPDATE__MAJOR_WARNING_EXTENSION: The available update is an important update, check before you do it, which might prevent some features from working properly. Do you really want to update the CMS?
